I used to play Fortnite all night. No sleep! But ever since Obama told me to try Raid Shadow Legends for free, I am addicted. This game is a game. It has graphics. It has characters. Best of all it has a loot box mechanic to enhance my experience even more by adding another exciting chance based layer to the game! Two week ago I spend all my money becoming a Raid Shadow Legend. Now I live in a dumpster outside a McDonald‚Äôs with free WiFi. At night I sneak into the McDonald‚Äôs like my new raccoon dad, Stripey, taught me to do so I can charge my phone. Through the cracked screen I am still perpetually amazed by the graphics of this game... they look so real! Thank you Obama, you truly changed my life!
I might be bad at a lot of games, and yes I also suck at this. Can recommend!

This game is very fun but somewhat unbalanced. As the survivors, you either hope the killer is unexperienced (and therfore easy to beat) or rely on teamwork to get the job done. Teamwork is the one weapon the survivors have that makes it even close to beating the killer. Very difficult game otherwise... The most important thing is we have BILL. William Bill Overbeck, what a guy! Every time me and my friends play, we are Bill. Always Bill. We are the BILL GANG! When I don't have a full lobby of friends we recruit outsiders using compelling messages such as:
"Be better, be Bill."
"Bill is love, Bill is life."
"Bill is the future, and the future starts with you."
And more... We know that William Bill Overbeck is from the "Left behind DLC", but in the Bill gang, there is no Bill left behind. Whether we all escape dead or alive, we will escape together. Anyways the game is very fun but make sure you coordinate with teammates, if the killer is experienced you don't stand a chance without teamwork.

TL;DR: Don't buy this game and expect to have fun for the first 100-200 hours unless you are okay with being completely outplayed by people who will have thousands of hours over you (or just have epic store hacked accounts)

I'd say I love this game but it's hard to enjoy it knowing that I can never get anyone to play this game anymore 
Anytime I bring anyone new into the game, they get absolutely shredded by a rank 1 killer with a 1000+ hours because skill based match making or they lose anyways because they didn't watch 500 dead by daylight videos, read every wiki article, the thesis essays worth of lengthy killer powers, and play at least a 100 hours to even understand the game.

The game is not noob friendly and will never be, especially because the tutorials are terrible. I can barely scrape enough older players by who already have ptsd from the terrible changes made to the game so teaching anyone how to play is impossible unless they absolutely will themselves into going through the torture.  

Not even counting the fact that Behavior can't keep it's older players because they refuse to listen or make good changes unless you wait the month to 3 year range for them to get the idea.
I don't want to rag on Behavior all that much since this is their first ever "big" game and it can be a lot to manage but with a team of 900+ employees you'd figure that changes would get rolled out faster and they'd focus on the survivablitity of their game rather than make 3 skins and nerf a random killer that no one plays once a month. 

I love this game but it gets really sad knowing that everyone old is leaving, no one new is coming, and I will only go against people who have logged in way too many hours and paid too much money to quit.

Lastly, the hacking is terrible and getting put in a game to just get held hostage until you are forced to dc or wait 2 hours.
You'd figure that no real game of dead by daylight is played for more than 45 minutes AT MOST and yet the endgame timer can be held infinitely because the anticheat is kind of a joke

p.s. explain the tutorial with the bot match for a more fluid experience because using a separate instance filled with a million pop ups that no one wants to read the second they start the tutorial is just filler and clunky, when a simplified bot match tutorial is much easier to go through 
Also making custom bot matches would probably help people understand the game infinitely better than just simply throwing you into a perkless match where the only killer is a trapper that can't hit you if you hold the W key
I'm okay with the bot's logic but not the fact that they can't play against a popular killer with harder mechanics, I mean is it simply just because trapper is easy to code while any other killer would be too hard since you'd have to put actual thought into it's logic?
I am a newbie of this game but it not bad

Really fun game to play. The gameplay requires you to be constantly on the edge of your seat, since the killer can come anytime. It has famous killers from many franchises I love.

Overall it's a fun game. Some survivor players are just selfish mfs, if you wanna quit in the middle of the game please don't play and to the killers that face camp from the start, you're wasting people's time. Bich I didn't wait half an hour of matchmaking just for the game to end in 5 minutes.

This game is so unbelievably. I was having a lot of on killer at first but then I started playing survivor! I think if I had one suggestion for this game is that they should add a perk for both killer and survivor that adds fun to the game! That would be fucking amazing!

so recommended, I actually play this game everyday since I tried it once, the prices of in-game purchase is very low and that's so cool
for example ( if you would like to buy a character it just coast about 5 Dollars or 5 Euro, and the DLC "which normally contains 1 survivor and 1 k-r it comes with a about 7 Dollars or 7 Euros which also great and that's a super low price in comparison with many other AAA games.
- Long-time queue time : you can simply wait for about 20 min if you're new to the game ( that's because of the Players Rank System ) this means you gonna get bored the first week waiting in the game lobby to match with other players. but once you play and play this time get shorter and shorter but still a problem that need a real fix in the game. 
I have to mention the free content : in this game a lot I mean a lot of characters are totally free so you can actually play totally free ( and this free play makes you B-points in game which they're the main currency that you will need to upgrade you character perks, offering and add-ons.
- Plus : you can literary buy any character in the game for Free! yeah you can purchase any character in the game with another (free- violet and pink currency ) that you will receive for just playing matches. ok to be honest this method is yes free but it costs many and many hours and days just to collect a very low amount of this (free- violet and pink currency ) but at least there is free option! not only a paid one. so yeah this game is so exacting and gonna be a great choice for people who like the ( Multiplayer-Horror ) or the ( Multiplayer-Survivor ) types of games
it can be toxic but its sooo addicting aaaa
